titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 627) to establish the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 627) to establish the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-184, by Mr. Dreier.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in part A of the report of the of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, modified by the amendments printed in part B of that report shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 62.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 375.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 186 (Roll no. 663).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 186 (Roll no. 663).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 627) to establish the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays.
